title: Honor Your Father - Part 1
description: An episode, affecting all subsequent generations, in the life of Noah and his three sons that exemplifies the principle of blessing or curse in the honoring of one’s father?for the Church the ‘father’ that our Judaistic forbears are.

title: Honor Your Father - Part 2
description: An episode, affecting all subsequent generations, in the life of Noah and his three sons that exemplifies the principle of blessing or curse in the honoring of one’s father?for the Church the ‘father’ that our Judaistic forbears are.
